name: Byz-dev
body:
#Welcome to **byz-dev**!

##About
This repository hosts digital versions of Byzantine authors.

These XML files were produced by data entry company Digital Divide Data (DDD), who corrected and encoded hOCR output generated by Bruce Robertson in accordance with the latest EpiDoc standards. While adequate, more can and should be done to improve the XML (the -dev(elopment) suffix indicates the repository is open to improvement).

##Volumes

* [Alexias](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/byz-dev/blob/master/annae_comnenae_1884.xml): Anna Comnena, _Alexias_ (1884) ed. Augustus Reifferscheid.

* [Epitome historiarum, Vol. I](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/byz-dev/blob/master/zonaras_1868_epitome_historion_vol1.xml): Johannes Zonaras, _Epitome historiarum_ (1868) ed. Ludwig Dindorf.
* [Epitome historiarum, Vol. II](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/byz-dev/blob/master/zonaras_1869_epitome_historion_vol2.xml): Johannes Zonaras, _Epitome historiarum_ (1869) ed. Ludwig Dindorf.
* [Epitome historiarum, Vol. III](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/byz-dev/blob/master/zonaras_1870_epitome_historion_vol3.xml): Johannes Zonaras, _Epitome historiarum_ (1870) ed. Ludwig Dindorf.
* [Epitome historiarum, Vol. IV](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/byz-dev/blob/master/zonaras_1871_epitome_historion_vol4.xml): Johannes Zonaras, _Epitome historiarum_ (1871) ed. Ludwig Dindorf.
* [Epitome historiarum, Vol. V](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/byz-dev/blob/master/zonaras_1874_epitome_historion_vol5.xml): Johannes Zonaras, _Epitome historiarum_ (1874) ed. Ludwig Dindorf.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
